MAIN_MESSAGE: It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown for safety at 10:01am in the LL21 Corwen and LL23 Bala areas following reports of a grounded overhead line. This may affect the supply to your property. Our engineers are on their way to investigate and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12:15pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:05am on 17th November 2020.
